TEXT: A brave cat warrior from Shinkirou, eager to explore the Spire. This feline conjurer harnesses the might of myriad beings known as shikigami.
You bring to bear all the strength of your shikigami...

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The tallest among them bares fanged teeth and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~"Join~ ~us~ ~o~ ~little~ ~cat,~ ~and~ ~feel~ ~the~ ~warmth~ ~of~ ~the~ ~Spire."~
